I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Upon reevaluating the paragraph, I realized that "HIT" is not a disease, but rather an abbreviation for "Heparin-Induced Thrombocytopenia." Therefore, the only valid disease entity in the paragraph is "Heparin-Induced Thrombocytopenia."
